dataExplorerEmptyState: Please select a table to get started.
invalidJsonDescription: The property {{property}} is not a valid JSON object.
hasErrors: Please fix the errors in the form before submitting.
deleteItemsDescription: Are you sure you want to delete these items?
deleteItemsDescriptionWithCount: You are about to delete {{count}} items. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?

views.noViews: No saved views found for this resource.
views.addFiltersFirst: Add filters first to save a view
views.viewNameDescription: Enter a name for the view
views.saveViewDescription: Save the current view to the database
views.saveViewButtonDescription: Save the current view to the database
views.cannotSave: Cannot save view. Please select a table first.
views.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for the view, e.g. 'All users from the US'
views.descriptionHelp: Help others find this view by providing a description.
views.shareWithRoles: Allow access to this view for specific roles
views.noRolesSelected: No roles selected. This view will be private to your account.
views.deleteViewDescription: Delete the saved view. The roles that have access to this view will no longer have access to it.

filters.enterSearchQuery: Enter a search query to see results.
filters.noValueNeededNull: No value needed for 'Is empty' filter.
filters.noValueNeededNotNull: No value needed for 'Is not empty' filter.
filters.pressEnterToApplyRange: Fill both fields and press Enter to apply

jsonPlaceholders.hasKey: Key name to check (e.g., email, address)

jsonHelp.simple: Searches for any text value within the JSON. Example: "john@example.com" finds records with that email anywhere in the JSON.
jsonHelp.keyValue: Find records where a specific key equals the given value. Example: key "status" = value "active"
jsonHelp.path: Use JSONPath notation to check if a specific nested path exists. Example: "$.user.profile" checks for user.profile structure
jsonHelp.hasKey: Check if the JSON contains the specified key, regardless of its value

jsonErrors.invalidKey: Invalid key format. Use only letters, numbers, and underscores, starting with a letter or underscore.
jsonErrors.missingColon: Key-value format requires a colon (:) separator
jsonErrors.invalidKeyValue: Both key and value must be provided
jsonErrors.malformedPath: Malformed JSONPath. Avoid empty path segments or trailing dots.

record.noNameTooltip: We could not infer a name from this record
record.systemFieldsDescription: System fields are automatically generated by the database
record.relatedRecordsDescription: Related records are records that are related to the current record
record.deleteRecordAlertDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
record.createDescription: Create a new record by filling out the form below.
record.editDescription: Edit the record by filling out the form below.
record.noRequiredFields: This resource has no required fields.
record.previewDescription: Click on any field to jump to its editor
record.noChanges: Please complete the form to submit changes.
record.recordsPartiallyDeleted: Records partially deleted. {{successCount}} records were deleted successfully, {{failureCount}} records were not deleted.
record.noEditableFields: This record has no editable fields.
record.clearValueToApplyDefault: Want to use the default? Click here to clear this field.
record.startTyping: Start typing to search for values

placeholder.jsonb: Leave empty for empty JSON object
placeholder.json: Leave empty for empty JSON object

record.filePickerHelp: Select a file to use its URL in this field. Only files you have read access to will be selectable.
record.manualUrlHelp: Enter a direct URL to any file, including external websites.
record.fileFieldHelp: You can upload a new file or browse existing files in your storage. Use the Advanced option to enter external URLs manually.
record.urlInputHelp: Enter a direct URL to any file or image. The URL should start with http:// or https://

emptyState.title: No table selected
emptyState.description: Select a table from the sidebar to start exploring your data.

operators.lte: Is less than or equal to
operators.gte: Is greater than or equal to

errors.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalid_time: Please enter a valid date time
errors.invalid_enum: Please select a value from the list
errors.invalid_ip: Please enter a valid IP address
errors.invalid_color: Please enter a valid color value
errors.maxLength: Please enter a value less than {{maxLength}} characters
